select * from (select aa.br_num,m.id,br.br_content,aa.brrcnt,b.b_num,b.category_num,m1.id bj_id,rownum rnum from (select br_num,count(m_num) brrcnt from board_reply_report group by br_num order by brrcnt desc)aa,board_reply br,member m,member m1,board b where aa.br_num=br.br_num and br_delete=0 and m.m_num=br.m_num and b.b_num=br.b_num and m1.m_num=b.bj_num) where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
